name: Bran Cereal Fruit Muffins
author: LizzyJane
summary: I keep this recipe for large gatherings, even picky eaters like these muffins!
ingredients: 1 (17 ounce) package wheat bran flakes cereal with raisins
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Grease 54 muffin cups or line with paper muffin liners
Beat bran cereal, buttermilk, flour, sugar, fruit cocktail, vegetable oil, eggs, cinnamon, and salt together in a bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until batter is blended, about 2 minutes
Spoon batter into prepared muffin cups, filling each about 2/3 full
Bake in the preheated oven until golden and set, 16 to 18 minutes
